name: Life of Ball Infinite
description:
You are a 3D ball. Jump onto green platforms but keep away from red ones!

Think fast to stay alive for as long as possible in a world where platforms are continuously being created and destroyed.

Red platforms will self-destruct as soon as you jump on them.
Green platforms will take a second or so to destruct.

Arrow keys to move, space to jump

Just keep on rolling!
~ Tanay Singhal
